## useSetFrameworkSettings() function

Get a setter for a resource's settings. If a key is provided in the setter, only that value is written, Otherwise it is the entire block. Note that setting the entire block does a merge over the previous, not a complete overwrite.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useSetFrameworkSettings(resource?: string): (value: any, key?: string) => void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  resource | string | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

(value: any, key?: string) =&gt; void
